B1 in a way that is in agreement with the true facts or with what is generally accepted: Have I pronounced your name correctly? Correctly answer this question for your chance to win a car!
B1 (of a way of speaking or behaving) in a way that is generally accepted and approved of: My mother took elocution lessons so she could speak correctly. My parents have taught me to behave correctly. See
